sentences.en: ‘I’m a prisoner in my own home.’ ‘Nonsense!’
sentences.cn: “我在自己家里就像个囚犯。”“胡说！”

sentences.en: "I'm putting on weight."—"Nonsense my dear."
sentences.cn: “我长胖了。”“胡说，亲爱的。”

sentences.en: By 1832 the idea had become an economic nonsense.
sentences.cn: 到了1832年，那种观点已经成为经济学的谬论。

sentences.en: Go along with you! What you say is all nonsense!
sentences.cn: 去你的! 你说的全是废话!

sentences.en: He had been unwittingly deluded by their mystical nonsense.
sentences.cn: 他不知不觉被他们故弄玄虚的胡说八道给骗了。

sentences.en: He had better cut out the nonsense.
sentences.cn: 他最好停止胡说八道。

sentences.en: He said that dowsing for water is complete nonsense.
sentences.cn: 他说用占卜杖探测水源完全是胡说八道。

sentences.en: He was talking utter nonsense as usual.
sentences.cn: 他像平常一样又在胡说八道了。

sentences.en: I think it's absolute nonsense.
sentences.cn: 我认为那十足是无稽之谈。

sentences.en: I'm ashamed of the babyish nonsense I write.
sentences.cn: 我对自己写出这么幼稚的东西感到羞愧。

sentences.en: I'm not buying any of that nonsense.
sentences.cn: 我才不信那些废话呢。

sentences.en: I'mnot having any of that nonsense.
sentences.cn: 我不想听那些废话。

sentences.en: I've never heard such a load of nonsense.
sentences.cn: 如此一派胡言，本人闻所未闻。

sentences.en: If you ask me, these modern teaching methods are a load of nonsense (= a lot of nonsense ).
sentences.cn: 要我说，这些现代教学方法全是一派胡言。

sentences.en: She saw herself as a direct, no-nonsense modern woman.
sentences.cn: 她认为自己是个直截了当、不拖泥带水的现代女性。

sentences.en: That's arrant nonsense.
sentences.cn: 那完全是一派胡言。

sentences.en: That's complete and utter nonsense!
sentences.cn: 那纯属一派胡言乱语！

sentences.en: the proposal would make a nonsense of their plans.
sentences.cn: 那项提议会让他们的计划变得荒诞不稽。

sentences.en: This, of course, is utter nonsense.
sentences.cn: 这当然是一派胡言。

sentences.en: You'll need no-nonsense boots for the jungle.
sentences.cn: 你需要一双实用的靴子穿越丛林。

trans.tran_en: ideas, opinions, statements etc that are not true or that seem very stupid
ideas, opinions, statements etc that are not true or that seem very stupid
